patthana18.17:1.1_0: Āsavasampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.17:2.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.17:3.1_0: Āsavasampayuttaṁ hetuñca āsavavippayuttaṁ hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.17:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana18.17:4.1_0: Āsavasampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.17:5.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.17:5.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
